Literature.Title: Identification of antimicrobial peptides from teleosts and anurans in expressed sequence tag databases using conserved signal sequences.
Literature.Author: Tessera V, Guida F, Jureti? D, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=10 µM,Human erythrocytes:70% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus MRSA-16(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus MRSA-G(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(IC50=0.6±0.05µM),Escherichia coli BW25113(IC50=0.7±0.1µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-WaaP(IC50=0.7±0.02µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(IC50=0.8±0.02µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(IC50=1.3±0.6µM)
